group_1.textRight: How sad...

group_1.textLeft: Who are you?

group_1.textRight: I am you.

group_1.textLeft: ...My soul gem has gotten so murky that I'm going crazy.

group_1.textRight: Something like that.
But all of that "those of us with power have to get @our hands dirty"...
That hurts my ears.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Because your stance would be "I have power but @still won't dirty my hands".
Three years ago, and this time as well,
I refused to dirty myself.@I refused to even try.
And that led to this miserable circumstance and sparked a new tragedy.

group_1.textLeft: You mean... you think I should've gotten my hands @dirty three years ago?
Should I have wished to kill them all?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's exactly it.

group_1.textLeft: No!@All of our efforts to this day would have been in vain!
That isn't the same as fighting for your people!
And afterward we could never return to our @peaceful, everyday, "ordinary" life ever again!

group_1.textRight: It's a mistake to think you all have ever been @ordinary at all.
You think you can just beat them up and turn them @into the police... how naive.
Once they're free, they'll be out for blood!@So start now and coat your hands in filth!!
You live in a world where you have to get your hands dirty in order to survive.
Heeeeeey!@Listen to me, heeey!!
Oh, sorry to disturb you.
I mean, this chick is dying, isn't she?
It's true... @Do you think the Myotron works a little too well...?

group_1.textLeft: (My soul gem is so muddy that it's hard to even speak...)
(No... just staying conscious... is getting harder...)
(Is this death? I'm dying...?)
(Then the last thing I can do... for everyone...)
The Blue Seas Family...@they really... aren't a bad group...
So... there's no need...@to get revenge...
(All I can do... is be sincere and ask...)
So don't attack them anymore...@please... I beg you...

group_1.textRight: Oh my! It's so rare to see an apology from the @Blue Seas Family.
[chara:801100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And with handcuffs on!@What a goddamn pervert!
...Hey there, are you alright?@Your voice has gone all small and lifeless, but...
Huh? Are you going to die?@So you can't call them?
That's not good~. @You won't be any good as bait that way.
Though I guess we could get some use out of @the body?
Yeah, let's kill 'er!
Maybe we can put a badge on her body and dump @it in the park...
Surely even those idiots will be able to understand @that.
Ha ha ha!@Apologizing for your friends!
It's useless! So useless!@How can you be so miserable?!
Whether the Blue Seas is evil doesn't even matter to them!
They just want revenge, that's all they care about.
Of course your sincerity will be ignored!
He's proven that there's nothing to be gained from keeping your hands clean.
No matter how sincerely you try to live a clean life,
There are evil bastards like that that don't care.
The Family lives in the most unreasonable world imaginable.
Get your hands dirty. YOU have to be unreasonable! Don't be soft, kill them!

group_1.textLeft: Am I...

group_1.narration: Am I really that soft?@Am I soft to want to live a peaceful and righteous life...?

group_1.textRight: [chara:801100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha—?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Meiyui! Why're you tryin' to put on airs, @rushin' ahead like that?!

group_1.textLeft: You know... it's been a while since I got to @show off my martial artsy side.

group_1.textRight: It was me.

group_1.textCenter: Well well...@Didn't expect that, he was supposed to be dead.
I didn't think you were dumb enough to stop and @treat him instead of chasing me...

group_1.textLeft: You! What are you doing awake?!@What about your stab wounds? Can you even walk?

group_1.textRight: I can't walk... they carried me here,@and now I'm about ready to pass out...

group_1.textLeft: You, why would you...

group_1.textRight: 'cause, that badge...@you stole it...

group_1.textLeft: Because... I didn't want to put everyone in...
Haha... there I go again,@saying something soft...

group_1.textRight: .........[wait:1.0][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Listen...@until now, I always thought...
Forsaking anyone who's a burden... so you can kill @your enemy... that's just how it is.
Because it's the easiest thing to do...
But after I got stabbed, and I thought I'd die alone...@ I was so scared.
That's why I was so happy that Meiyui stayed @with me...
I hated myself for thinking that way...@and that's why I said...
But... I woke up and thought...
I'm so glad to be alive...
Meiyui, you really are the strongest!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, me.

group_1.textRight: What is it, me?

group_1.textLeft: I am not soft.

group_1.textRight: Oh, are you finally ready to get your hands dirty @and kill them?

group_1.textLeft: No, I won't dirty my hands and I won't kill anyone.
It's so easy for me, someone with power, to get my hands dirty to fix things.
But will taking the easy way out like that really @make you happier?

group_1.textRight: That's sophistry, quibbling over details and using convenient hindsight.

group_1.textLeft: But the result is a miracle that my will brought @about.
If I can save the lives of my friends, I won't hesitate.

group_1.textRight: .........@[wait:1.0][chara:301202:lipSynch_1]Hm, I guess you're ready then.
Alright, I'll lend you my power until the day you get @your hands dirty.
We got the call and came here...@but... what's going on here?

group_1.textLeft: I certainly don't know.
I've never heard of the kidnappers themselves reporting a kidnapping before...
The kidnapper is also crazy unresponsive, so...
The victims are sleeping soundly...@and one of them is badly injured.

group_1.textRight: How can they sleep in a situation like this?
Did something happen with some sleeping pills @after all?
But looking at everyone here, and especially this @child's sleeping face...
